caption.center: In the Matter of the Final Accounting of ABRAHAM STREIFER, as Committee of
the Person and Property of BERTHA F. BANGS, an Incompetent Person. (Two

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Third Department.

opinion.opinion_text:
Motion to dismiss appeal denied, without costs. In view of the dispute between the parties as to the record it should be settled before the court at Special Term.
In decisions Nos. 1-96 the court is as follows: Bergan, P.J., Coon, Gibson, Herlihy and Reynolds, JJ.
